arts.ttl: St. Pauli snatch dramatic victory in relegation six-pointer at Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: Goals from Alexander Bernhardsson and Danel Sinani looked certain to earn both sides a point, before heartbreak at the death for Kiel gave Pauli a huge boost in their fight for survival. Alexander Bernhardsson (l.) and Magnus Knudsen (r.) celebrate Kiel's opening goal, giving the hosts a surprise lead against the run of play.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli edge Kiel in relegation battle with dramatic injury-time winner
arts.sum: FC St. Pauli secured a vital win against Holstein Kiel thanks to a late goal.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli captain Jackson Irvine discusses club culture in extended interview
arts.sum: FC St. Pauli's colorful captain Jackson Irvine gave a colorful interview with Germany's main sporting tabloid earlier this week.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel v St. Pauli preview: Newcomers battle in classic relegation six-pointer
arts.sum: St. Pauli hope to extend the gap between them and the relegation zone with a big win away in Kiel.

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. St Pauli - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and St Pauli, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
